title: Trade Agreement
blocka: Action: Spend two resource dice to initiate trade with a faction.
blockb: Gain a number of new resource dice equal to the disposition of the faction.
blockc: Dice gained and spent should match trade wheel for faction.

title: Development Research
blocka: Action: Purchase one available development. Shuffle into an asset deck.

title: Amber Lodge
tags: Location: Spotlight, Red Bank, Urban, Sorcery
blockb: Immediate: A character at this location may spend 9 progress to remove one condition.

title: Strategic Investments
blocka: Action: Spend 5 fortune to place one progress.
blockb: Immediate: Spend 4 progress to increase any disposition track by one.
blockc: Immediate: Spend 7 progress to increase any resource track by one.

title: Hilltop Square
tags: Location: Spotlight, Red Bank, Urban, Stability
blockb: Action: Gain one Fortune.

title: Resource Gathering
blocka: Action: Test (Resource Track). Use value of resource track for test. For each success, gain one resource die of that type.

title: Hogel Manor
blockb: Immediate: Spend 9 progress to increase Sunrider Disposition track by one.

title: Horsethief Meadows
blocka: Action: Spend 3 Food to add progress equal to Tactics on any card with a Military tag.

title: Arban the Swift
blockb: Action: Test (Command 1). Success: Discard. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (FORCEFUL) +3 Discord. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Feast at Hogel Manor
blockb: Action: Task (Rapport).
blockc: Immediate: Spend 5 progress. Increase Sunrider Disposition track by one. Move to stage 1.

title: Song Bluff
blocka: Effect: All characters increase their Tactics by Sunrider Disposition while at least one character is at this location.
blockb: (DOOM) Test (Command 4). Failure: One character at this location is shaken.

title: Uneasy Truce
blockb: Action: Task (Survival).
blockc: Immediate: Spend 7 progress. One character at location gains +1 Tactics. Move to stage 2.

title: Ile
blockb: Action: Test (Lore 1). Success: Discard. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (WEIRD) +3 Discord. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Rumors of Smoke and Fire
blockb: Action: Task (Tactics).
blockc: Immediate: Spend 7 progress. Increase Sunrider Disposition track by one. Complete Mission Path.

title: Taichu
blockb: Action: Test (Tactics 1). Success: Discard. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (QUICK) +3 Discord. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Hogel
blockb: Action: Test (Rapport 1). Success: Discard. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (SNEAKY) One character at Sunriders location is angry. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Dashen
blockb: Action: Test (Rapport 1). Success: Discard. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (GANG) +2 Discord. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Channeling on the Steppes
blockb: Success: +2 Mana Dice.
blockc: Failure: All characters are frustrated.

title: Taichu's Test
blockb: Success: +1 Fortune.
blockc: Failure: One character is frustrated.

title: Arban's Sunset Ride
blockb: Success: +1 Fortune.
blockc: Failure: One character is frustrated.

title: Battle Plans
blockb: Success: +1 Fortune.
blockc: Failure: +3 Discord.

title: Imperial Strategies
blockb: Success: Place one progress on any Sunrider challenge or location.
blockc: Failure: +2 Discord.

title: A Bitter Grudge
blocka: Requirement: An angry character at a Sunrider location.
blockb: Immediate: Play on the angry character. Rapport tests character is involved in are difficult for remainder of mission.

title: Shame To Anger
blocka: Requirement: A frustrated character at a Sunrider Location.
blockb: Immediate: The frustrated character gains the angry condition.

title: The Coming War
blockb: Success: Add two progress to any Sunriders location or attachment.

title: Rousing Speech
blockb: Success: +1 Fortune.
blockc: Failure: +2 Discord.

title: A First Impression
blockb: Success: +1 Fortune.
blockc: Failure: +2 Discord.

title: Welcome Party
blocka: Immediate: Gain an amount of fortune equal to diplomacy.

title: Gray River
blocka: Action: Convert any number of Timber dice into Fortune dice.

title: Mirror Woods
blockb: Immediate: Spend 9 progress to increase Timber track by one.
blockc: (DISASTER) Test (Survival 3). Failure: All characters at this location are weary.

title: Exposed Overlook
blockb: Action: Spend progress. 5: +1 Timber die. 9: +2 Timber dice. 11: +3 Timber dice. 12: +4 Timber dice.
blockc: (CALAMITY) A fire breaks out! Lose all progress on this location.

title: Musty Tomb
blocka: Effect: All characters at this location have +1 Lore.
blockb: (SORCERY) Test (Lore 2). Failure: One character at this location is shaken.

title: Lush Fields
blocka: Action: Spend 3 Fortune to gain +1 Food die.
blockb: (SAFE) If a character is at this location, gain +3 Food dice.

title: Salmon Run
blockb: Immediate: Spend 10 progress to raise Food track by one.
blockc: (DISASTER) Test (Survival 3). Failure: One character at this location is weary.

title: The Weird Rock
blockb: (DOOM) Test (Lore 3). Failure: One character at this location is shaken.

title: The Rosy Freetrader
blockb: Immediate: Spend 12 progress to gain one secret.
blockc: (DISASTER) Test (Disguise 2). Failure: One character at this location is weary.

title: Map Hall
blockb: Immediate: Spend 5 progress to discard one Graycloak.

title: House of Cloves
blocka: Effect: All characters at this location have +1 Disguise.
blockb: (DOOM) Test (Rapport 2). Failure: One character at this location is angry

title: Root Cellar
blocka: Action: Move one Graycloak from any occupied location to the Root Cellar.
